Object.Field:
Author: Sunopsis Version: 4.1 Last Update: JUL-2005
Description: - Journalizing Knowledge Module - This JKM provides simple journalizing procedures on IBM DB2/400 tables - The following objects are created: - Subscribers central table - Journal table - Trigger on the journalized table that tracks the data changes in the Journal table - Views for selecting data
Restrictions: - This Knowledge Module creates triggers on your source tables. Be sure to validate the scalability of your applications before releasing your developments in your production systems. - To use this IKM, the temporary (C$, I$...) and target tables should be stored in AS400 collections (or AS400 journalized libraries), otherwise, an SQL7008 message will be signalled (refer to the IBM DB2/400 documentation for details concerning SQLCode 7008).

create view <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_DATA_VIEW")%> /* This view is created in the work physical schema of the current Data server */ as select distinct case when (<%=snpRef.getColList("", "char(TARG.[COL_NAME])", " || ", "", "PK")%> is null) then 'D' else 'I' end <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_FLAG, JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN.JRN_DATE <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_DATE, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]		" + snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "PK")%>, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "TARG.[COL_NAME]		" + snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "NOT PK")%> from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN left outer join <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TARG on ( <%=snpRef.getColList("", "TARG.[COL_NAME]	= JRN.[COL_NAME]", "
		and	", "", "PK")%> ) where JRN.JRN_DATE = ( select max(L.JRN_DATE) from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> L where L.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER and <%=snpRef.getColList("", "L.[COL_NAME]	= JRN.[COL_NAME]", "
				and	", "", "PK")%> )

delCmd = """ delete from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> where JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ? """
# Prepare the delete prepDelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(delCmd)
# Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepDelStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepDelStmt.executeUpdate()
prepDelStmt.close()
# Commit updates myCon.commit()

create trigger <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_UTRIGGER")%> after update on <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> referencing NEW as NROW for each row mode db2sql insert into <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> ( JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN_CONSUMED, JRN_FLAG, JRN_DATE, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "PK")%> ) select JRN_SUBSCRIBER, '0', 'I', current timestamp, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "NROW.[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "PK")%> from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> where JRN_TNAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' /* The following line can be uncommented for symetric replication */ /* and upper(USER) <> upper('<%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>') */

create trigger <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_DTRIGGER")%> after delete on <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> referencing OLD as OROW for each row mode db2sql insert into <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> ( JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN_CONSUMED, JRN_FLAG, JRN_DATE, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "PK")%> ) select JRN_SUBSCRIBER, '0', 'D', current timestamp, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "OROW.[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "PK")%> from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> where JRN_TNAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' /* The following line can be uncommented for symetric replication */ /* and upper(USER) <> upper('<%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>') */

create table <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> /* This table is created in the work physical schema of the current Data server */ ( JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "50")%> not null, JRN_CONSUMED <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1")%>, JRN_FLAG <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1")%>, JRN_DATE <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE")%>, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] default null", ",\n\t", "", "(PK)")%> )

create view <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_VIEW")%> /* This view is created in the work physical schema of the current Data server */ as select distinct case when (<%=snpRef.getColList("", "char(TARG.[COL_NAME])", " || ", "", "PK")%> is null) then 'D' else 'I' end <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_FLAG, JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN.JRN_DATE <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_DATE, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]		" + snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "PK")%>, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "TARG.[COL_NAME]		" + snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "NOT PK")%> from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN left outer join <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TARG on ( <%=snpRef.getColList("", "TARG.[COL_NAME]	= JRN.[COL_NAME]", "
		and	", "", "PK")%> ) where JRN.JRN_DATE = ( select max(L.JRN_DATE) from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> L where L.JRN_CONSUMED = '1' and L.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER and <%=snpRef.getColList("", "L.[COL_NAME]	= JRN.[COL_NAME]", "
				and	", "", "PK")%> )

create trigger <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_ITRIGGER")%> after insert on <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> referencing NEW as NROW for each row mode db2sql insert into <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> ( JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN_CONSUMED, JRN_FLAG, JRN_DATE, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "PK")%> ) select JRN_SUBSCRIBER, '0', 'I', current timestamp, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "NROW.[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "PK")%> from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> where JRN_TNAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' /* The following line can be uncommented for symetric replication */ /* and upper(USER) <> upper('<%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>') */

delCmd = """ delete from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS where SUBS.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ? and SUBS.JRN_TNAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' """
# Prepare the delete prepDelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(delCmd)
# Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepDelStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepDelStmt.executeUpdate()
prepDelStmt.close()
# Commit the updates myCon.commit()

import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang
# Connect to the Source Database ie the one that hosts the journalized tables myCon = snpRef.getJDBCConnection("SRC")
# Create the list of Subscribers for a CDC Set lstSbs = [] <%= snpRef.getSubscriberList("" , "lstSbs.append('[SUBSCRIBER]')", "\n", "") %>
Alter subscribers table for V3 comp

alter table <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> add JRN_ROW_COUNT <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> add JRN_DATA_CMD <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> add JRN_COUNT_CMD <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%>

create table <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> ( JRN_TNAME <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "35")%> not null, JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "50")%> not null, JRN_REFDATE <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE")%>, JRN_ROW_COUNT <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%>, JRN_DATA_CMD <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%>, JRN_COUNT_CMD <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%>, constraint <%=snpRef.getObjectNameDefaultPSchema("L","PK_SNP_JRN_SBS","W")%> primary key (JRN_TNAME, JRN_SUBSCRIBER) )

insCmd = """ insert into <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> ( JRN_TNAME, JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN_REFDATE, JRN_ROW_COUNT, JRN_DATA_CMD, JRN_COUNT_CMD ) values ( /* JRN_TNAME */ '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', /* JRN_SUBSCRIBER */ ?, /* JRN_REFDATE */ current timestamp, /* JRN_ROW_COUNT */ 0, /* JRN_DATA_CMD */ null, /* JRN_COUNT_CMD */ 'update <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> set JRN_ROW_COUNT=(select count(''X'') from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> where JRN_SUBSCRIBER=''$$SUBSCRIBER_NAME$$'') where JRN_SUBSCRIBER=''$$SUBSCRIBER_NAME$$'' and JRN_TNAME=''<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>''' ) """
selCmd = """ select count('X') from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS where SUBS.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ? and SUBS.JRN_TNAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' """
# Prepare the statements prepInsStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(insCmd) prepSelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(selCmd)
# Execute for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepSelStmt.setString(1, sbs) rs = prepSelStmt.executeQuery() rs.next() nbSubs = rs.getInt(1) if (nbSubs == 0): prepInsStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepInsStmt.executeUpdate()
prepInsStmt.close() prepSelStmt.close()
# Commit the updates myCon.commit()
